comments.raw_text:
Build identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:6.0a1) Gecko/20110413 Firefox/6.0a1

The Object Inspector from Web Console turns black after a screen unlock.

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Open Web Console (CTRL+SHIFT+K)
2.Type inspect() and press enter
3.Lock Screen
4.Unlock Screen

Actual Results:
4.Inspector window is black, and after a second partially repaints

Expected Results:
4.Inspector window is unchanged
comments.text:
Created attachment 525978
screenshot completly black

comments.author: mihai.sucan@gmail.com

comments.text: I believe this is not a Developer tools problem. It is a problem with the xul:panel implementation and/or a problem with hardware acceleration for such panels.
comments.raw_text: I believe this is not a Developer tools problem. It is a problem with the xul:panel implementation and/or a problem with hardware acceleration for such panels.

moving to Gfx.
